mnd1:9.4: na hehisī”ti → na hehisi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | na hohisīti (pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed)
mnd1:13.3: jāgu → jagu (si, mr) | jātu (sya-all) | jagū (pts-vp-pli1ed), indagu → indagū (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd1:20.3: Atha antena jahati → atho antena jahati (sya-all) | asahantena dahati (mr)
mnd1:30.8: supatīti → sappatīti (mr), sarīsapo → siriṃsapo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sirisapo (sya-all)
mnd1:31.4: paligedho → paḷigedho (bj), āyūhinī → āyūhanī (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd1:51.5: mahiṃsā → gomahisā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), ahī vicchikā → ahi vicchikā (sya-all) | ahivicchikā (pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed), rakhasā → rakkhasā (mr)
mnd1:84.4: Neva saṃsibbati → neva sineti (bj) | neva visīneti (sya-all) | neva visineti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd1:84.15: atammayatāya → akammassakatāya (si) | akammaññatāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | akammayatāya (csp1ed), bhavapariyante ṭhito, saṃsārapariyante ṭhito vaṭṭapariyante ṭhito, antime bhave ṭhito →  etthantare pāṭho si potthake
